## GAD-7 vs GSE

GAD-7 vs GSE: A Comprehensive Comparative Analysis In a rapidly changing world where the necessity of evaluating individual's mental health is becoming increasingly important, psychological assessment tools like the Generalised Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7) and General Self-Efficacy Scale (GSE) are commonly used. But how closely related are these two seemingly different scales? Exploring the correspondence between GAD-7 and GSE could provide critical insights. Thus, discerning the similarities or differences in GAD-7 vs GSE can contribute to deeper understanding in the field of psychology. Luckily, a tool named Harmony has been developed precisely for such harmonisation tasks. Harmony simplifies the process of comparing and correlating different psychological instruments like GAD-7 vs GSE. Employing advanced AI and natural language processing, the platform can effectively match questionnaire items, even ones in different languages. This revolutionary tool thus eliminates the potentially tiresome and subjective process of manual harmonisation, allowing for a more accurate, efficient, and objective analysis of GAD-7 vs GSE. In the realm of comparative psychological research, tools like Harmony bring unprecedented opportunity to unlock novel insights. By leveraging the features of Harmony, researchers and psychologists can easily explore the similarities and differences in GAD-7 vs GSE. The comparison results could serve as a valuable foundation for broader research, contributing significantly to our understanding of mental health. With Harmony, the potential for discovery in the field of psychology is vast; all it takes is a quick drag and drop, and Harmony does the rest.

## Compare the items in GAD-7 English and GSE

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import GAD-7 and GSE into Harmony and harmonise them</a> - find similarities between the two instruments using our AI platform
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GAD-7 into Harmony</a> - compare GAD-7 English with other instruments
* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#" target="harmonyapp">Import just GSE into Harmony</a> - compare GSE with other instruments


## Questions in GAD-7

|   No. | GAD-7 English                                                                                                                                      |
|------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|     1 | Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge                                                                                                               |
|     2 | Not being able to stop or control worrying                                                                                                         |
|     3 | Worrying too much about different things                                                                                                           |
|     4 | Trouble relaxing                                                                                                                                   |
|     5 | Being so restless that it is hard to sit still                                                                                                     |
|     6 | Becoming easily annoyed or irritable                                                                                                               |
|     7 | Feeling afraid, as if something awful might happen                                                                                                 |
|     8 | If you checked any problems, how difficult have they made it for you to do your work, take care of things at home, or get along with other people? |
